mapper.select: select i.id as id, i.code as code, i.name as name, i.sex as sex, i.age as age, i.price as price, i.type as type, i.attention as attention, i.remark as remark, gi.checkgroup_id groupId from t_checkitem i LEFT JOIN t_checkgroup_checkitem gi ON i.id=gi.checkitem_id GROUP BY i.id

select id, code, name, sex, age, price, type, attention, remark from t_checkitem
code like "%"#{keyword}"%" or name like "%"#{keyword}"%"
mapper.insert: insert into t_checkitem( code, name, sex, age, price, type, attention, remark ) values( #{code}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{age}, #{price}, #{type}, #{attention}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: update t_checkitem set code=#{code}, name=#{name}, sex=#{sex}, age=#{age}, price=#{price}, type=#{type}, attention=#{attention}, remark=#{remark} where id=#{id}
